comments: It is conjectured that this is 1 iff n is 1 or a prime.
references: R. K. Guy, Unsolved Problems in Number Theory, A17.
links: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: a:= proc(n) local S,m;    S:= 1;    for m from 1 to n-1 do      S:= S + m &^(n-1) mod n;    od:    denom(S/n);end proc;seq(a(n),n=1..1000); # _Robert Israel_, May 30 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 11 2000
